name: Jarlsberg Cheese Dip
author: sarah s
summary: I have taken the liberty of doubling this recipe because I have yet to meet a single person who didn't rave about the taste, eat too much of it, and then beg for the recipe! Now I am giving it to the world so I won't have to make it anymore. I think I have made it over 500 times...seriously. Serve hot with sturdy crackers.
ingredients: 2  sweet onions (such as Vidalia®), thinly sliced
1 pinch paprika, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat
Cook and stir onions in hot butter until soft and translucent, 7 to 12 minutes
Stir onions, Jarlsberg cheese, and mayonnaise together in a large bowl
Spread cheese mixture into 2 pie dishes
Bake in the preheated oven until dip puffs slightly and cheese is melted, 25 to 30 minutes
